title.rendered: The Permanent Secretary, Amb. Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa in a briefing session organized for the Diplomatic Community in Nigeria.

content.rendered: Today, 4th August, 2023, the Perm. Sec. MFA, Ambassador Adamu Ibrahim Lamuwa in a briefing session organized for the Diplomatic Community in Nigeria, on current political developments in the Republic of Niger and the ECOWAS Sub-Region, highlighted efforts being made to amicably resolve the political impasse in Niger and ensure the restoration of democratic governance in that country.
